text: @ChrissieEvert I can’t believe I still have to watch and listen to all you has been commentate tennis.  Tennis is more political than coronavirus.  Go find a seniors usta league.  #ignorance @PatrickMcEnroe @espn  seriously time for NEW tennis commentators #tennisfansmatter
